category: Hardware, software or communications equipment and facilities
description: System software is rendered incapable of facilitating current business objectives.
mitigationStrategy:
Avoidance strategies:
- Allocate a proportion of staff time to monitoring the ongoing suitability of repository software and assessing the potential value of emerging technologies
- Evaluate effects of system changes prior to their implementation
- Pre-empt software obsolescence with anticipatory investment In the event of risk’s execution:
- Seek formal assurances or SLAs from software suppliers or providers of third-party software services
name: Software failure or incompatibility
notes:
- Are policies and procedures in place to monitor the adequacy of software technologies amid changing community requirements and external influences?
- What service level guarantees are offered from third-party software service providers?
- Is a proportion of staff time allocated to determining the ongoing suitability and operational functionality of software?
preMitigationNotes: - Software update breaks dependencies of other core software services
